#summary This page lists the requirements for developing Usus.

= Requirements =

  * Eclipse 3.6 or above
  * Graphical Editing Framework Zest Visualization Toolkit SDK (from the preconfigured Eclipse downloads site)
  * Subversive SVN Team Provider (Incubation) (from the preconfigured Eclipse downloads site)
  * Subversive SVN Connectors (from http://www.polarion.org/projects/subversive/download/eclipse/2.0/update-site/)
  * SVNKit 1.3.3 Implementation (from http://www.polarion.org/projects/subversive/download/eclipse/2.0/update-site/)
